```{r}
#117 is lbs carbon/MMBTU for gas or 0.0585 tons/MMBTU
#210.8 is lbs carbon/MMBTU for coal or .1054 tons/MMBTUgen
			
			
#carbontax = (priceratio*`basegas' - `basecoal')/(0.1054-priceratio*0.0585)

basegas <- 5.75
basecoal <- 2.25




dat <- dat %>% 
  mutate(carbontax = (CR*5.75-2.25)/(0.1054-CR*0.0585))

tax_east <- dat %>% 
  filter(carbontax >= 0 & carbontax <= 70 & intercn == "EAST")

tax_wecc <- dat %>% 
  filter(carbontax >= 0 & carbontax <= 70 & intercn == "WECC")

tax_ercot <- dat %>% 
  filter(carbontax >= 0 & carbontax <= 70 & intercn == "ERCOT")
```
